references.paper_title: MVTec AD - A Comprehensive Real-World Dataset for Unsupervised Anomaly Detection
references.reason: This paper introduces a widely used benchmark dataset for anomaly detection, which is extensively used for evaluating the proposed method and comparing it to existing methods.

references.paper_title: PaDiM: A Patch Distribution Modeling Framework for Anomaly Detection and Localization
references.reason: This paper proposes PaDiM, a strong baseline method in anomaly detection which is used for comparison in this paper
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational work for the anomaly-free customized model used in this paper

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models, which is a key component for personalization in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: WinCLIP: Zero-/few-shot anomaly classification and segmentation
references.reason: This paper proposes WinCLIP, a state-of-the-art few-shot anomaly detection method that directly inspired the design of the proposed method and is used as a baseline for comparison.
